WRITING.TEXT:
nicoleaxe116
anyone feel free to add me!
Fiber grams of carbs? As in soluble vs insoluble fiber?

WRITING.TITLE: Newbie question about net carbs
WRITING.TEXT:
Hi. I'm new here. On the FAQ, it said calculate net carbs you just take (carbs)-(fiber). This might be a really silly question, but can I take the total number of carbs consumed for the day and subtract the total amount of fiber? For example, today I had 45 total grams carbs and 23 grams of fiber. (food diary for reference)
http://www.myfitnesspal.com/food/diary/nicoleaxe116
Does that leave me with 22 net carbs? I *think* 45 grams would be too high to enter ketosis, but 22 probably wouldn't be. That's just me guessing though, I've never done this before. Thanks for the input!

WRITING.TITLE: I'm so lost...
WRITING.TEXT:
Hi lovely ladies! I do not own one bra that fits. I get boobie muffin top, and the band is way too tight for comfort. My boobs *hurt*, and my back is killing me. I get angry red marks on my shoulders and back. Currently, I wear a 36D. I measured myself using the mywifesbusty, and this is what I got
Under/band:36 in
Leaning over:45 in
Standing up:43 in
Which puts me at a 36FF(UK size)??? I have a few questions for you wonderful gals
1.)how is going from a 36D to a 36FF help the too tight band situation?
2.) If I wear, say a 38 or 40D, would that theoretically compensate for too small cup and band size at the same time?
3.) If I'm 36 around, why don't my current 36s fit me? I am missing something about bra sizes, or did I just measure incorrectly? Or could be be because I am ...err a squishy not very toned person?
4.)Are the Curvy Kate bras as pretty in real life as they are online?
Thank you in advance!

WRITING.TITLE: Why do some calculators add +6 inches to the band measurement?
WRITING.TEXT:
for example http://www.shopblums.com/measuring-tips
What on earth?
read that as methicillin resistant staphylococcus aureus. Which is MRSA, not MRAS. very different.

WRITING.TITLE: Covering/hiding a tattoo on a beach?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm going to Jamaica for a week with my family. My father doesn't know about a very large tattoo I have on my thigh(http://imgur.com/p3F6M). He doesn't exactly approve of tattoos, let alone one this big. Any ideas on covering up/hiding it?Or do I just suck it up an tell him? If so, any ideas on how to break it to him? Thanks in advance!
thats a good idea, thank you

WRITING.TITLE: Just finished my 1st quilt. Now, how on earth do I clean it? (yes, I asked google 1st)
WRITING.TEXT:
It's a tee shirt quilt, backing is cotton. It was machine quilted and bound, not very well. However, since I had to put it on the floor often to work on it, it is covered in dog hair. There are also some chalk markings. I did google how to clean a quilt, but the results were all over the place. How do I get this thing clean? Thank in advance, you wonderful quilters!
edit:I machine washed it on the hand wash cycle and put it in the dryer on low. It came out wonderfully, thank you so much!
I wasn't sure about the tights either, thank you

WRITING.TITLE: 21st birthday outfit advice?
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm turning 21 in exactly a week(hurray!). To celebrate, my friends and I are going to a nice restaurant, then going bar hopping. So I need an outfit that transitions well from a restaurant or a bar. this is what I came up with
http://imgur.com/prDVc http://imgur.com/97KjE http://imgur.com/tEJ4z http://imgur.com/hKpQM
Constructive Criticism greatly appreciated! If it helps, I'm 5'4", 160, 36D. Thanks in advance
edit: Bigger pictures http://i.imgur.com/WfWBU.jpg http://i.imgur.com/jzzwt.jpg http://i.imgur.com/UxfmO.jpg http://i.imgur.com/trIyb.jpg
I will get try that, thank you!
